channel.description: okay guys i want to make it where once you use a dbone on the atler it gives alot of xp maybe like 4k each 1 but idk how to change the exp rate can some1 help me please?

item.title: 317 help again prayer based
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You don’t have to call me sir, lol. I have a name. Do you have a PI?

Plus if it is, it will be something more like

case ####://Object ID

Not the && (c.objectID))

Here’s an example taken from my source, incase you’d like to use anything else (providing you have a Project Insanity source), otherwise I cannot help you.
Change the data accordingly.

package src.server.model.items.UseItem;

Inside the

public static void ItemonObject(Client c, int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int itemId) {

Add a new case (objectID)

case 11001://Pedastal Armadyl
			
				if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(7635, 1)) {

					c.getItems().deleteItem(7635, c.getItems().getItemSlot(7635), 1);
					c.gfx0(481);
					c.forcedChat("I summon thee, General Kree'arra. Now feel my wrath!");
					c.startAnimation(828);
					c.sendMessage("You summon General Kree'arra.");
					Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, 2558, 3318, 9379, 0, 1, 255, 48, 370, 300, true, true);

				} else {

					c.sendMessage("You need a Leather book to summon General Kree'arra.");

				}
			break;

You can use all that as a base. To add XP to prayer just add

c.getPA().addSkillXP(4000, 6);//4k XP to skill 6 (Prayer)

Basically, if you need it explaining thoroughly or need a level requirement, let me know.

Regarding your PM – I don’t have time to sit on MSN atm.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help again prayer based
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Well have you added the

if ((c.itemUsed == ####) && (c.objectID == ####)) {
        c.deleteItem(526, 1);
        c.getPA().addSkillXp(4000, 6);
}

That’s all you have to basically do – but your methods will be different of course.

Read full topic
